column4: I'm having trouble with my reiserfs drive.  reiserfsck says that there are bad blocks and that it's a hardware issue and tells me to buy a new drive, but I would really like to save my data.  Is this possible?
dd command can read that and save as much as it can.. I do believe..
With dd, do I need free space equal to the whole drive, or just the amount of data on the drive.
IF it wont mount I dont know what will read it.. that is free anyhow
